member.name: T:Tms.Sdk.Download.DownloadRequest
member.summary: POS requests a list of DataSets to the server. Server validates whether the requested DataSets are allowed to the specific POS model. Server adds a list of valid DataSets into the response message. This kind of request is answered through a AcceptorConfigurationUpdate message.

member.summary: Sale affiliation key, unique merchant identification.

member.summary: Creates a download request, requiring mandatory data.
member.param: Collection of DataSets which will be requested
member.exception: Thrown when one or more parameters are invalid. Inner exception is set with parameter details.

member.summary: Collection of reports returned by the host. Contains information based on the collection of Parameters sent at the DownloadRequest .

member.name: T:Tms.Sdk.Download.Entry.TmsAid
member.summary: Application Identifier.

member.name: P:Tms.Sdk.Download.Entry.TmsAid.AcquirerNumber
member.summary: Acquirer identifier. Responsible for the AID table (in ABECS, Stone is represented by "8").

member.name: P:Tms.Sdk.Download.Entry.TmsAid.ApplicationId
member.summary: Application Identifier (AID). AID – Application.

member.name: P:Tms.Sdk.Download.Entry.TmsAid.TefBrandId
member.summary: Brand identification in BrandTable.

member.name: P:Tms.Sdk.Download.Entry.TmsAid.ApplicationName
member.summary: Application name. Preferred mnemonic associated with the AID.

member.name: P:Tms.Sdk.Download.Entry.TmsAid.AidLength
member.summary: AID field length.

member.name: P:Tms.Sdk.Download.Entry.TmsAid.Priority
member.summary: Indicates the priority of a given application or group of applications in a directory

member.name: P:Tms.Sdk.Download.Entry.TmsAid.TargetPercentage
member.summary: Target Percentage to be Used for Random Selection

member.name: P:Tms.Sdk.Download.Entry.TmsAid.MaximumTargetPercentage
member.summary: Maximum Target Percentage to be used for Biased Random Selection:

member.name: P:Tms.Sdk.Download.Entry.TmsAid.FloorLimit
member.summary: Indicates the floor limit in the terminal in conjunction with the AID. In case of Brazil, represented at centavo.

member.name: P:Tms.Sdk.Download.Entry.TmsAid.TerminalActionCodeDenial
member.summary: Terminal Action Code – Denial. - This specifies the terminal's conditions to reject a transaction. - Specifies the acquirer’s conditions that cause the denial of a transaction without attempt to go online

member.name: P:Tms.Sdk.Download.Entry.TmsAid.TerminalActionCodeDefault
member.summary: Terminal Action Code – Default. Specifies the acquirer’s conditions that cause a transaction to be rejected if it might have been approved online, but the terminal is unable to process the transaction online

member.name: P:Tms.Sdk.Download.Entry.TmsAid.TerminalActionCodeOnline
member.summary: Terminal Action Code – Online. - Specifies the acquirer’s conditions that cause a transaction to be transmitted online - This specifies the terminals's conditions to approve a transaction online.

member.name: P:Tms.Sdk.Download.Entry.TmsAid.DefaultDynamicDataObjectList
member.summary:
Default Dynamic Data Authentication Data Object List
The DDOL is a list of data that the card requires if the DDA (Dynamic Data Authentication of card and terminal data to verify that the card application and data are genuine.) method is used during Data Authentication, and the terminal may also store a default DDOL that can be used if the DDOL is not present in the data from the card. The terminal uses the DOL processing rules to format the requested data and then sends it to the card in the Internal Authenticate command.

member.name: P:Tms.Sdk.Download.Entry.TmsAid.DefaultTransactionDataObjectList
member.summary: Default Transaction Certificate Data Object List: The TDOL is a list of data that the terminal must use as the input when it needs to calculate a transaction cryptogram hash, and the terminal may also store a default TDOL that can be used if the TDOL is not present in the data from the card. The terminal uses the DOL (Data Object List) processing rules to format the requested data, but this is only required if the transaction cryptogram hash is required by either of the CDOL.

member.name: P:Tms.Sdk.Download.Entry.TmsAid.ApplicationVersion
member.summary: Application version number. (TAG 9F09) Version number assigned by the payment system for the application.

member.name: P:Tms.Sdk.Download.Entry.TmsAid.AidIndex
member.summary: Recorder index in this table (from "01" to "99").

member.name: P:Tms.Sdk.Download.Entry.TmsAid.ApplicationType
member.summary: Application type (from "01" to "98").

member.name: P:Tms.Sdk.Download.Entry.TmsAid.TerminalCountryCode
member.summary: Terminal country code. (TAG 9F1A) Indicates the country of the terminal, represented according to ISO 3166

member.name: P:Tms.Sdk.Download.Entry.TmsAid.TerminalCurrencyCode
member.summary: Transaction Currency Code. (TAG 5F36) Indicates the currency in which the account is managed according to ISO 4217

member.name: P:Tms.Sdk.Download.Entry.TmsAid.TerminalCurrencyExponent
member.summary: Transaction Currency Exponent. (TAG 5F36) Indicates the implied position of the decimal point from the right of the amount represented according to ISO 4217.

member.name: P:Tms.Sdk.Download.Entry.TmsAid.AdditionalTerminalCapabilities
member.summary: Additional Terminal Capabilities. (TAG 9F40) Indicates the data input and output capabilities of the terminal

member.name: P:Tms.Sdk.Download.Entry.TmsAid.TerminalType
member.summary: Terminal Type. (TAG 9F35) Indicates the environment of the terminal, its communications capability, and its operational control

member.name: P:Tms.Sdk.Download.Entry.TmsAid.ContactlessZeroAmount
P:Tms.Sdk.Download.Entry.TmsAid.ContactlessMode
member.summary: Contactless mode. Terminal capability to the referred AID, in case it's located in a CTLS.

member.name: P:Tms.Sdk.Download.Entry.TmsAid.ContactlessTransactionLimit
member.summary: Terminal/Reader Contactless Transaction Limit.

member.name: P:Tms.Sdk.Download.Entry.TmsAid.ContactlessFloorLimit
member.summary: Terminal/Reader Contactless Floor Limit.

member.name: P:Tms.Sdk.Download.Entry.TmsAid.ContactlessCvmLimit
member.summary: Terminal/Reader CVM (Cardholder Verification Method) Required Limit

member.name: P:Tms.Sdk.Download.Entry.TmsAid.ContactlessApplicationVersion
member.summary: Contactless Application Version. (TAG 9F6D) PayPass Mag Stripe Application Version Number (Terminal).

member.name: P:Tms.Sdk.Download.Entry.TmsAid.MerchantId
member.summary: Merchant Identifier. (TAG 9F16) When concatenated with the Acquirer Identifier, uniquely identifies a given merchant

member.name: P:Tms.Sdk.Download.Entry.TmsAid.TerminalId
member.summary: Terminal Identification. (TAG 9F1C) When concatenated with the Acquirer Identifier, uniquely identifies a given merchant

member.name: P:Tms.Sdk.Download.Entry.TmsAid.MerchantCategoryCode
member.summary: Merchant Category Code. (TAG 9F15) Classifies the type of business being done by the merchant, represented according to ISO 8583:1993 for Card Acceptor Business Code.

member.name: P:Tms.Sdk.Download.Entry.TmsAid.TerminalCapabilities
member.summary: Terminal Capabilities. (TAG 9F33) Indicates: - the card data input, - CVM: Carholder Verification Method - security capabilities of the terminal.

member.name: F:Tms.Sdk.ManagementPlan.TypeCode.ManagementPlanActionCode.Upload

member.name: T:Tms.Sdk.ManagementPlan.TypeCode.ManagementPlanActionResult
member.summary: Possible results received/expected on a Management Plan operation. Final result of the processed terminal management action.

member.summary: Access is denied while performing the action.

member.summary: Problem to connect while performing the action.

member.summary: Data transferred has a wrong format.

member.summary: Timeout expired during the data transfer.

member.name: M:Tms.Sdk.TerminalManagementServiceClient.SendRequest``1(Tms.Sdk.RequestBase,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Maps the request received as parameter to a request formatted on ISO 20022. Serializes the mapped request and sends it to acquirer host. Expects to receive, desserialize, demap and return the response.
member.param: Request to be send to acquirer host.
If the request will be blocking or asynchronous.
member.returns: Demapped response received by the acquirer host.
member.exception: Could not communicate to the host.
Some invalid parameter send in request.

member.name: M:Tms.Sdk.TerminalManagementServiceClient.Communicate``2(``0,System.String,System.Nullable{System.TimeSpan})
member.summary: Sends a request to server, and try deserialize the response into Tout type, if is not possible try deserialize into AcceptorRejection.
member.typeparam: Type to try deserialize the server response
member.param: the request message in ISO20022 format.
the route to send the request in server base address.
member.returns: an object that inherits of response base can be the Tout or a AcceptorRejection

member.name: M:Tms.Sdk.TerminalManagementServiceClient.TryDeserializeResponse``1(System.String)
member.summary: Try deserialize the incoming string as the expected response or acceptor rejection.
